<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rampaging Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=2630) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kitsune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=341" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Change Shape](/Actions.aspx?ID=701) with a fox alternate form

</column>

---

Once per day, when you Change Shape into a fox, you can instead gain the effects of both the canine form of 5th-level [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=10) and 7th-level [_fiery body_](/Spells.aspx?ID=115) for 1 minute or until you shift back, whichever comes first. You can cast [_produce flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=236) from the fiery body effect even though you're in a battle form.

**Special** If you are a [frozen wind kitsune](/Heritages.aspx?ID=139), your form is ice instead of fire. This changes the immunity and damage from the _fiery body_ effect to cold, changes the weakness to fire, and changes _produce flame_ to [_ray of frost_](/Spells.aspx?ID=245)
name: Rampaging Form
prerequisite: Change Shape with a fox alternate form
